results.title: Risk factors for COVID-19 hospitalisation and death in people living with diabetes: A virtual cohort study from the Western Cape Province, South Africa
results.text_hl: Use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ was associated with a reduced risk of hospitalisation and mortality in @<m>DISEASE_Anthropophobia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C000719191 @@@PLWD@@@.

citations.NLM: Dave JA, Tamuhla T, Tiffin N, Levitt NS, Ross IL, Toet W, Davies MA, Boulle A, Coetzee A, Raubenheimer PJ. Risk factors for COVID-19 hospitalisation and death in people living with diabetes: A virtual cohort study from the Western Cape Province, South Africa Diabetes Res Clin Pract. 2021 Jul;177():108925. PMID: 34166703
